#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Wear White Booties
#Text=White booties are versatile and easy to style .
#Text=Pair them with blue , black , or white jeans for an easy outfit .
#Text=To mix it up , wear your white booties with skirts and shorts .
#Text=You can even wear your white booties on nicer occasions with dresses , skirts , or suits .
#Text=White booties go with every color and so many different styles of clothing , so get ready to enjoy experimenting with different outfits .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Styling with Jeans
#Text=Pair your white booties with blue jeans for a casual look .
#Text=Blue jeans will be the most casual look , great for hanging out with friends or running errands .
#Text=You can pair your blue jeans with a white top if you want to coordinate with your booties , a black top for contrast , or a colorful top to mix it up .
#Text=A long gray cardigan can make this outfit perfect for fall .
#Text=Wear black jeans with your booties for slightly more formal occasions .
#Text=If your work lets you wear black jeans , pairing them with white booties is a great way to make the outfit a little bit fancier .
#Text=Black jeans and white boots go well with a blue or white button-down .
#Text=Keep in mind that straight-cut black jeans are dressier than faded , cropped , or skinny black jeans .
#Text=Create a bold , all-white look with white jeans , booties , and a top .
#Text=You have to be fairly confident to pull this one off , and make sure it ’s a day where you wo n’t really be outside much so there ’s no chance of getting your white outfit dirty .
#Text=Try pairing a loose white blouse with skinny white jeans , or a tighter white top for looser jeans .
#Text=Consider adding a pop of color to your all-white outfit with a colorful handbag .
#Text=Wear white booties with cropped jeans that end above your boots .
#Text=Cropped jeans are a great item to style with white booties .
#Text=You can get cropped jeans that just brush the top of your booties , or ones that show a little bit of ankle – it ’s up to you .
#Text=Wide-leg crop jeans will give you a more dramatic look , while skinny cropped jeans will look cute and playful .
#Text=Try double cuffing your full-length jeans above your boots .
#Text=Roll up the jeans at the bottom hem twice in crisp folds .
#Text=Make the folds wide enough that your cuffs reach the top of your booties or a little higher to show a bit of ankle .
#Text=You may have to unroll and try again a few times before you find a height that you like .
#Text=Go for a more casual single cuff look as an alternative .
#Text=Single cuff your jeans by rolling up the bottoms .
#Text=Your cuffed jeans should end just at or above the tops of your white booties .
#Text=The single cuff is n’t for everyone , so if seeing the hem of your denim bothers you , you can always go back to double cuffing .
#Text=Keeping it Casual with Shorts and Skirts
#Text=Wear white booties with jeans shorts or dress shorts .
#Text=While it ’s most common to see people wearing boots with full length pants , wearing jean shorts or dress shorts with boots is a fun way to change up your normal summer outfit .
#Text=If you ’re wearing short shorts , pair them with a loose top for a balanced outfit , but if your shorts are on the longer side , you can wear a tighter top .
#Text=Wearing shorts with high-heeled boots can visually elongate your legs .
#Text=Try a colorful mini skirt with white booties .
#Text=Wear a skater mini that flares out , a bodycon mini , or even a denim mini skirt .
#Text=When wearing a mini skirt , you might want to pair it with a looser , longer top to balance how much skin you are showing .
#Text=Mini skirts look great with crop tops or graphic tee shirts .
#Text=Wear tights under a mini skirt in the winter to stay warm and stylish .
#Text=Pair a denim skirt with white booties for a flirty look .
#Text=Denim skirts are a cute option for spring and summer outfits .
#Text=Your favorite denim skirt will look great with white booties , whether it ’s a pencil skirt , a mini skirt , or even a full length denim skirt .
#Text=Wear a crop top with your denim skirt for a more casual settings , or tuck in a nice blouse to step it up a notch .
#Text=Avoid wearing white booties with athletic shorts .
#Text=Athletic shorts are comfortable and can even be fashionable , but they look better when paired with running shoes , sneakers , or flip-flops .
#Text=Sweatpants and athletic shorts are just a little too informal to look good with booties .
#Text=Dressing Up with Dresses and Suits
#Text=Dress up a short summer dress with white booties .
#Text=White booties go well with all kinds of short summer dresses , from colorful floral prints to all-white dresses .
#Text=The booties will instantly make a sundress look just a little bit fancier , and perfect for a date .
#Text=Do n’t wear your white booties if you ’re going to the beach though – they ’ll be a real pain on the sand and will probably get dirty .
#Text=Try a long , flowing maxi dress with heeled white booties .
#Text=Heeled booties instantly make your maxi dress seem classier .
#Text=For a smooth look , wear a maxi dress that extends beyond the tops of your booties , so that you ca n’t see any ankle .
#Text=Maxi dresses look great with lots of accessories like beaded necklaces , bangles , and earrings .
#Text=Wearing booties instead of sandals with your maxi dresses means you can wear them in the winter , too .
#Text=Pair your favorite jumpsuit with white booties .
#Text=Different kinds of jumpsuits are good for different occasions – a cotton printed jumpsuit is great for casual wear , while a linen jumpsuit is dressier .
#Text=Dress up your jumpsuit with a formal blazer or dress it down with a leather or denim jacket .
#Text=White booties with heels can also lengthen your legs if your jumpsuit is a little too long when you wear flats .
#Text=Wear white booties with a colorful pantsuit for powerful business attire .
#Text=White booties are great to pair with pantsuits , because white goes with every color , from the brightest reds to the softest purples .
#Text=White booties and a colorful pantsuit is a bold look – so try it on before at home before wearing it to an important meeting .
#Text=For a job interview , you should probably stick to a more conventional black pantsuit with black shoes .
